Package cp213

Class SingleStack<T>

java.lang.Object
cp213.SingleLink<T>
cp213.SingleStack<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the SingleStack data type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>
public class SingleStack<T>
extends SingleLink<T>
A simple linked stack structure of Node T objects. Only the T data contained in the stack is visible through the standard stack methods. Extends the SingleLink class, which already defines the head node, length, peek, isEmpty, and iterator.
Version:
2020-10-16
Author:
your name here, David Brown

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleStack

      public SingleStack()

  • Method Details

    • pop

      public T pop()
      Returns the top data of the stack and removes that data from the stack. The next node in the stack becomes the new top node. Decrements the stack length.
      Returns:
      The data at the top of the stack.

    • push

      public void push​(T data)
      Adds data to the top of the stack. Increments the stack length.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to add to the top of the stack.
